JobFullDesc: As a member of our Responsible Innovation team, you will play a key role in supporting Facebook’s ongoing efforts to build innovative products thoughtfully and responsibly. We’re seeking an experienced editor and storyteller to lead content strategy for the Responsible Innovation team. This person will work closely with the other members of the Responsible Innovation team and support our efforts to scale insights and institutional knowledge, and bring internal awareness to our work. They will also be responsible for sourcing and editing compelling stories that bring the Responsible Innovation mission to life. The ideal candidate has experience developing and executing content channel strategies, is passionate about creative storytelling steeped in audience insights, and is able to translate priorities into compelling narratives using a variety of mediums. The ability to synthesize complex concepts into clear and engaging messaging is key to success in this position, as is the ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams and leadership.
